basics.name: Nguyen Huu Duc
basics.label: Front-end developer
basics.summary: I have a strong Javascript foundation, front-end technology, self-study, always catch-up cutting edge front-end technologies and try to be more productivity and improve developer experiences. I am interesting in static type languages and functional programming.

highlights: Build https://carousellmotors.com from scratch: react, redux, redux-saga, server-side rendering.
Lead a team of 5 to build Carousell Pro in React Native.
Member of platform team refactoring and implement new features to improve web SEO.

work.summary: I build a Call Center application for BlueBird, the biggest taxi firm of Indonesia by using React, Electron, RethinkDB.
highlights: Build application with cutting-edge technologies: React, Redux, Electron, Ramda.
Use RethinkDB and Horizon.io to build realtime application.
Help another team build an analytics application base on highchart.js.

work.summary: Together with team build high quality large scale single page application for Network Management system for Alcatel-Lucent Inc.
highlights: Build directives to help colleagues remove boilerplate and be more productive.
Build an AngularJS service for oboe.js to handle stream JSON response to provide better user experience and fail-safe.
Use WebSocket to provide real-time topology application.
Member of Solution Team, reviews and provide feedback for colleague's mockup, support teammate resolve troubles and train newcomers.

work.summary: Gather requirement, specification and design a web-based management system for Vietnam Posts and Telecommunications Group.
